About

What am I?

Currently I am pursuing a PhD at Stanford University in California, USA. Even though my degree says Biology, my research doesn't exactly quite fit within the mold of my department nor the. I'm interested in many things like urban ecology, environmental justice, and spatial data (I'm a big map guy).
